title: Xbox Series X Details Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.24.20
description:
Blessing and Greg dive deep into Phil Spencer's rundown of what the Xbox Series X has under the hood.

Time Stamps - 
00:09:50 - Housekeeping
Firewall: Zero Hour PS I Love You Play Date is tomorrow! 6 pm PT! It’s free this month! https://www.youtube.com/UploadVR
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis, Frankfurter, Drew Gardiner, Katie Gallacher, David Meintel, Shiraz Razak, Dominic Shorter, Mohammed Mohammed, Patrick Higgins, Ginny Berndt, The Nano Biologist, Travis  Guy-kow-ski, Joseph Soler
The Roper Report   -
00:06:35 - Xbox Series X Specs, Phil Spencer
00:27:00 - With the recent announcement from Microsoft that your xbox one games can be upraded to the series x version for free (TIM WAS RIGHT BABY!) do you think Sony will be forced to take a similar approach? - Best Friends Q:Paulo
00:39:10 -  Does the Xbox news this morning get you any more excited for the Series X or just next gen in general? - Best Friends Q:DJBradChill
00:51:49 - DualShock 5 to use BioFeedback? Jake Bishop @ RespawnFirst
00:55:49 -  THE BESTIES
00:56:37 - THE GAMING RIDE HOME PODCAST
00:57:32 - Kojima Bails on GDC Over Coronavirus, Julia Lee @ Polygon
01:00:40 - Bethesda Bounces from GeForce Now, James Batchelor @ GIB
01:03:30 - Out today
01:06:35 - Squad Up: Come play Firewall with us tomorrow night! 6 pm PT! youtube.com/uploadvr
01:07:12 - You‘re Wrong
This Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg and Blessing
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Blessing and Tim
FRIDAY: Greg and Blessing
